column4: OMG i just figured out why i cant resize my NTSF partitions with gparted. It doenst supprt any fuctions regarding NTFS.  AHHHHHHHH, does anyone know of a stable partition utility that i can download to resize my NTFS partitions from with inside Ubuntu
good luck..; I have a removable drive.. ntfs was messy to get working with rw permissions
sorry gnome look was for them,es for  gnome was just asked for it
the qtparted site claims to work with the NTFS but you need mkntfs and ntfsresize for it to work. have you ever heard of these?
